ValidationRule.description: If Meeting Connection Method = PSTN Dial Out or VoIP, then additional detail needed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ( ISPICKVAL( Meeting_Connection_Method__c , 'PSTN Dial Out') || ISPICKVAL( Meeting_Connection_Method__c , 'VoIP') ), ISBLANK ( User_s_Number_Dialed__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must provide User's Number Dialed/ANI
